entry.title: A Tether in the Dark
entry.summary:
Author: ReadNowSleepLater

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 37,805Chapters: 30/?Kudos: 162

Summary: Stiles Stilinski never meant to become a myth. After the fall of his pack and the fading of Beacon Hills’ magic, he runs – straight into a world older, darker, and far more complicated than he ever imagined. Mystic Falls is supposed to be a quiet place to start over, to ground himself again. Instead, it becomes the center of a storm he didn’t know was waiting for him. Drawn into the tangled lives of the Mikaelsons, Stiles finds unexpected warmth among immortals who should’ve terrified him – and something dangerously close to belonging. Between Elijah’s steady grace, Kol’s mischief, Klaus’ possessive charm, and Peter’s return from the shadows, he starts to build something new: a family stitched together by chaos, magic, and a kind of love that defies logic. But magic never lets go without a fight, and neither do old bonds. When ghosts from his past and creatures from the dark rise to claim him, Stiles has to face what it truly means to be an anchor – and what, and who, he’s willing to tether himself to. Because in the end, even in the dark, someone always reaches back.

entry.title: Dying In Love
entry.summary:
Author: amatorial

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,510Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 20

Summary: After dropping out of his FBI internship, Stiles returned to Beacon Hills, struggling to outgrow the version of himself high school forced him to become. He wasn't sure what he was doing with his life, but he kept busy among the shelves at The Reading Nook, letting the quiet and routine distract him from the memories. And then Derek Hale walked in. Derek being in his life again stirred a hunger inside Stiles, a wanting that consumed him whole. It left him breathless, filled with a love so fierce it clawed at his chest and threatened to tear him apart inside. —Weekly Updates—

entry.title: You're Never Gonna Be Alone (We'll Rule The World)
entry.summary:
Author: RoseByAnyOtherName17

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,364Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 19

Summary: Derek felt better equipped now. Stiles’ help had given him enough breathing room to re-orient himself and really accept his new reality as a father. Derek was beyond grateful, but he couldn’t impose anymore.Stiles, naturally, thought this was incredibly stupid.“You know I’m not asking you to leave, right?” he questioned indignantly, spoon of mashed potatoes hovering, forgotten, between his plate and his mouth. “Like, have I given any indication that I want you to get out? Truly, because if so, I need to know so I can stop doing it.”“No, of course not,” Derek said hastily, abandoning his own spoonful of chili (bless Stiles for his somewhat unconventional food combinations that always turned out to be delicious). “I just – it’s time, you know? I really, really appreciate all your help, really, I don’t know how I would have gotten through this first stage without you. But I’ve taken up enough of your time and space.”Stiles stared at him, clearly unimpressed. “So that’s what this is about.”--When Derek has a hard time with feeling guilty over essentially forcing Stiles to co-parent Eli with him, Stiles sets the record straight.

entry.title: The Weight of Wings
entry.summary:
Author: QueenRumi21

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,055Chapters: 1/16Kudos: 21

Summary: Stiles Stilinski thought turning eighteen would mean college applications, sleepless nights, and maybe finally admitting he had a crush on one very broody Alpha werewolf. He did not expect wings. Overnight, Stiles learns the truth his father has kept hidden his whole life: he isn’t human. He’s a Nephilim—half-angel, half-human, dangerously powerful, and growing stronger by the day. With a pair of pure white wings and abilities he can’t control, Stiles is forced to confront a past he never knew existed… and a destiny he never asked for. As the pack scrambles to understand what Stiles is becoming, Derek Hale feels something inside him stir—something ancient, instinctive, impossible to ignore. A connection he can’t explain. A bond he can’t run from. Secrets unravel. Powers awaken.And the weight of wings is heavier than Stiles ever imagined. Nephilim Stiles. Protective Derek. Pack feels. Slow burn Sterek.Family drama, supernatural lore, found family, and a boy learning what it means to be more than human.

entry.title: Full Moons and Family Drama
entry.summary:
Author: thenerdyindividual

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,503Chapters: 3/6Kudos: 163

Summary: Talia Hale survives the Hale Fire, along with Laura, Derek, Peter, and Cora. It's been roughly ten years since the events of that night, and to say that it left scars would be an understatement. Desperate to bring her Pack back to its old strength, Talia will not stop pushing her children and brother to settle down and have kids of their own. For this year's Cold Moon, Peter finally brings someone home. Stiles is not at all what Talia was expecting. He's far too young for Peter, he's human, and worst of all a man. (No biological children to carry on the Pack). He also doesn't give a shit what Talia says about him. His mere presence is enough to have her melting down, and it's bad for the simmering tension between her and the rest of the Pack. Unfortunately, everyone else likes him. Derek might like him more than the rest. A little too much. Aw hell, he has a crush on his uncle's boyfriend. Or: Five times Peter brought Stiles to a Full Moon Run + One time Derek did. (Updates every other Tuesday)

entry.title: Survivors
entry.summary:
Author: Nenufarluz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 88,660Chapters: 33/?Kudos: 162

Summary: The world fell into ruin in just a few days, overtaken by a virus that turned ordinary people into ravenous undead. Amid the chaos, Stiles, a college student in New York, is forced to leave the safety of his dorm and try to make his way across the country. His destination: California, where he hopes to find his father and best friend still alive.The journey is brutal. Zombies aren’t the only danger, here’s hunger, cold, loneliness, and the cruelty of other survivors. Along the way, Stiles meets Derek Hale, a gruff and guarded man who is also searching for his family. Together, they form a strong alliance, fighting side by side through the devastation.As the world around them falls apart, the two discover something stronger than fear and loss: the growing connection between them. Amid the pain, the possibility of something unexpected begins to emerge... maybe even love.

entry.title: Through the Window
entry.summary:
Author: Helloloveyes

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,845Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 132

Summary: He hurries toward the bathroom while his dad tells him there's a man at the station who came to turn himself in. Stiles half listens to the story as he catches his reflection. Good god. He has marks on his neck. Bite Marks. Both sides. Real. A slow, giddy smile starts to spread across his face when the story his dad is telling over the phone makes him halt completely. “What?” “Apparently, someone walked into the station to turn themselves in. When the deputy asked for what, all he said was to ask the Sheriff’s kid.” The words make his heart clench, his brain jump starting and coming with awful conclusions. “Dad. entry.title: Forgotten Ties Will Not Keep Us Apart
entry.summary:
Author: GDTiger

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,893Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 24

Summary: After the return of a monster they thought was long gone, Stiles and Lydia lost everyone in their pack. They are presented with one last chance, to save their pack and hopefully reunite what was once lost.   (alt. Stiles and Lydia going back in time only to forget their mission and instead just flirt with Derek and Laura) My version of a time travel fix -it :)
